text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea bentongensis (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, White Meranti) is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea bentongensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31431A9634275. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31431A9634275.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
